channel.title: CVE Feed for FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. and Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. and Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47584|2024-08-29T15:15:45.277Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20and%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- v-server
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in V-Server V4.0.18.0 and earlier and V-Server Lite V4.0.18.0 and earlier. If a user opens a specially crafted VPR file, information may be disclosed and/or arbitrary code may be executed.

item.title: CVE-2023-47582|2024-08-29T15:17:08.167Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20and%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- tellus
item.description: Access of uninitialized pointer vulnerability exists in TELLUS V4.0.17.0 and earlier and TELLUS Lite V4.0.17.0 and earlier. If a user opens a specially crafted file (X1, V8, or V9 file), information may be disclosed and/or arbitrary code may be executed.

item.title: CVE-2023-47585|2024-08-29T15:13:49.252Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20and%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- v-server
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in V-Server V4.0.18.0 and earlier and V-Server Lite V4.0.18.0 and earlier. If a user opens a specially crafted VPR file, information may be disclosed and/or arbitrary code may be executed.
